303.question: How big are the datasets?
303.response: {'Answer': 'The datasets are In-House, ACE05, and Arabic and Chinese. The In-House dataset has 1137 English (Source), 280 German (Target), 451 Spanish (Target), 322 Italian (Target), 396 Japanese (Target), and 390 Portuguese (Target). The ACE05 dataset has 479 English (Source), 323 Arabic (Target), and 507 Chinese (Target).'}
303.answer:
In-house dataset consists of  3716 documents 
ACE05 dataset consists of  1635 documents
